tool.name: Split
tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**TIP:** If your data is not TAB delimited, use *Text Manipulation->Convert*
-----
This tool splits a dataset in 2 datasets (1/3 and 2/3 of the input data). If the "Labels column" is set to "None" the dataset is split randomly while if it indicates the column of the labels the dataset is split randomly but taking care of having elements of each class into each of the 2 new datasets. This operation is useful to check the accuracy of classification algorithms.
